name: Journey to the Promised Land
description:
Many generations before our time, a hero fallen from grace reached these shores in search of the promised land. What was the promised land, they knew not, but sounded pretty cool and they were bored back at home. But they knew they did not have much time left, so they would have to pass on their quest onto the next generation...

Battle your way through 5 areas, dozens of enemies, play as 4 different races and defeat the boss to earn your ticket to the promised land! And always make sure to have a baby to replace you on your quest!!!

Game developed for the 24th Godot Wild Jam. For this jam, we tried to fit the 4 wildcards, see if you can spot them!
